title: Why can't i post in Team recruitment?
body: Says im lvl 3 when im lvl 19.

replies.body:
Hey Tiestoo,

The Boards levels don't automatically update when you level up in League of Legends. However, each time you post on the Boards, your level should update and reflect your League of Legends level. Are you still encountering issues posting on the Boards because of your level?
